text: List of cities of each of the islands in the former Netherlands Antilles. Aruba left the Netherlands Antilles in 1986. ==Island of Aruba== * Oranjestad* * San Nicolaas * Noord ==Island of Bonaire== *Kralendijk* *Antriol *Boven Bolivia ==Island of Curaçao== *Willemstad* ==Island of Saba== *The Bottom* ==Island of Sint Eustatius (Statia)== *Oranjestad* ==Island of Sint Maarten== *Philipsburg* *Lower Prince's Quarter *Cul de Sac *Cole Bay *Upper Prince's Quarter *Little Bay *Simpson Bay *Lowlands * Capital of respective island. title: List of cities in the Netherlands Antilles
